lesson.title_and_level: Upper-Intermediate - Registering with the Police Station

sentence.idiomatic: Go and document which people cannot come to attend tomorrow's meeting.
The information documented on this form and the actual information are inconsistent.
When are you going to register your marriage?
What kind of checks do foreign travelers entering the United States have to go through?
These past few years the number of people entering Hong Kong has been ever increasing.
Which articles can be brought into the country?
Please redeem the prize within the stipulated time period. If the time period is exceeded it is null and void.
If your credit card payment is overdue you must pay a fixed penalty.
The developer transferred possession of the homes one month late, resulting in a lot of disgruntled purchasers.
If you return the books late you have to pay a fine.
He got a 50 RMB fine yesterday for jaywalking.
When students forget their textbook they have to pay a fine--it's so unreasonable.
I didn't arrive late on purpose, honestly--the traffic was terrible.
If you intentionally ignore him, then what will he do?
Why would you intentionally lose the last competition? No one gets it.
I have downloaded a lot of songs from the internet.
Where can you download anti-virus software from?
I downloaded that data into my computer, I can take my time looking at it later.
Hello, I want to register my residence.
Did you bring your passport?
I did, here you go.
Hmm, you've been in China this long? The government stipulates that you have 24 hours after you enter to register. If you exceed that there is a fine.
Officer, I didn't know that. I did not do it on purpose.
Oh, all right. I will let it go this time. Next time you need to pay more attention. Take this form and fill it out. Did you bring a photocopy of your passport?
A photocopy? I brought the real thing.
Along with the original, you also need to photocopy the first page in your passport along with a copy of your visa.
Oh so that's how it is. I didn't bring that. Can you copy it here?
Our local police station does not have a photocopier. You can go across the street to the small shop. It is close.
How many copies?
One copy is enough.
If I move in the future, do I have to come back and register?
Yes. You also have to come back and register when you return to China after a trip home. Next time do it within 24 hours, otherwise there will be a fine.
OK, I've got it.
You can also download the form off the internet. In the future you can come with a completed form, and the procedure will go much more quickly.
Pardon me, Officer. I will first go and copy my passport.
OK. Hurry back.
